timeline.bodyText: can you take care of the wild card import?
timeline.author: dev-gaur

timeline.message:
Fix #2088: Support for networking.k8s.io/v1beta1#Ingress

+ Added model and DLS support for networking.k8s.io/v1beta1 Ingress
+ Modified kubernetes client handler generator logic to generate handlers with respect to apiVersions
  in order to avoid collisions
